text: Modjo were a French musical duo. The group fromed in Paris in 1999. The two members of the group were Romain Tranchard and Yann Destagnot. Tranchart (born 9 June 1976) was a producer. Destagnol (born Yann Destal, 14 July 1978) was a singer. The group did very well with their 2000 single "Lady (Hear Me Tonight)". The group broke up in 2003. ==Other websites== * * Yann Destagnol (Yann Destal) Twitter Category:French musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1999 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2003
title: Modjo
